short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a pop-up notebook without ads, a complicated filesystem, nor a bazillion settings (but dark mode!).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By clicking the extension button a basic, minimalist, notebook appears. Here you can write whatever you want, and your words are locally stored. In the bottom right corner is a dark mode button.
